fno: Turnover on the National Stock Exchange's futures & options (F&O) segment was Rs 145.77 lakh crore compared with Rs 112.20 lakh crore reported in the previous session. In the cash market, the Nifty 50 lost 61.75 points or 0.34% to settle at 17,894.85. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, advanced 3.89% to 15.0225. HDFC Bank, Federal Bank and Reliance Industries were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The January 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 25 January 2023.
